extension.summary: Papaw's AZR Redux is gebaseerd op de originele Arctic Zephyr-skin gemaakt door jurialmunkey. Papaw's AZR Redux gaat over eenvoudig, strak, minimalistisch en uiterst aanpasbaar.
Papaw's AZR Redux is based on the original Arctic Zephyr skin created by jurialmunkey. Papaw's AZR Redux is about being simple, clean, minimalistic and extremely customizable.
Papaw's AZR Redux is based on the original Arctic Zephyr skin created by jurialmunkey. Papaw's AZR Redux is about being simple, clean, minimalistic and extremely customizable.
Papaw's AZR Redux is based on the original Arctic Zephyr skin created by jurialmunkey. Papaw's AZR Redux is about being simple, clean, minimalistic and extremely customizable.
AZR Redux de Papaw se basa en el aspecto original de Arctic Zephyr creado por jurialmunkey. AZR Redux de Papaw se trata de ser simple, limpio, minimalista y extremadamente personalizable.
L'AZR Redux de Papaw est basé sur le skin original Arctic Zephyr créé par jurialmunkey. AZR Redux de Papaw se veut simple, propre, minimaliste et extrêmement personnalisable.
L'AZR Redux de Papaw est basé sur le skin original Arctic Zephyr créé par jurialmunkey. AZR Redux de Papaw se veut simple, propre, minimaliste et extrêmement personnalisable.
Papaw's AZR Redux sukurtas remiantis originalia Arctic Zephyr oda, kurią sukūrė jurialmunkey. Papaw AZR Redux yra paprastas, švarus, minimalistinis ir labai pritaikomas.
Papaw's AZR Redux is gebaseerd op de originele Arctic Zephyr-skin gemaakt door jurialmunkey. Papaw's AZR Redux gaat over eenvoudig, strak, minimalistisch en uiterst aanpasbaar.
Papaw's AZR Redux opiera się na oryginalnej skórce Arctic Zephyr stworzonej przez Jurialmunkey. Papaw's AZR Redux ma być prosty, czysty, minimalistyczny i niezwykle konfigurowalny.
Papaw's AZR Redux se bazează pe pielea originală Arctic Zephyr creată de jurialmunkey. Papaw's AZR Redux este despre a fi simplu, curat, minimalist și extrem de personalizabil.
AZR Redux от Papaw основан на оригинальном скине Arctic Zephyr, созданном jurialmunkey. AZR Redux от Papaw — простой, понятный, минималистичный и чрезвычайно настраиваемый.
extension.description: [CR][CR]Overweeg alstublieft om onze inspanningen te ondersteunen met een [B][COLOR deepskyblue]"kopje koffie"[/COLOR][/B] door de QR te scannen code hieronder of ga naar [COLOR deepskyblue]bit.ly/3Lb5nd5[/COLOR]. [COLOR limoengroen] (Vrijgevigheid zoals die van jou is tegenwoordig zeldzaam. Ik dank je bij voorbaat voor je steun. Ik ben erg dankbaar voor je donatie en waardeer je vriendelijkheid enorm!)[/COLOR][COLOR hemelsblauw] • De Papaja[/COLOR]

[CR][CR]Please consider supporting our efforts with a [B][COLOR deepskyblue]"cup of coffee"[/COLOR][/B] by scanning the QR code or visiting [COLOR deepskyblue]bit.ly/3Lb5nd5[/COLOR]. [COLOR limegreen] (Generosity like yours is rare to find these days. I thank you in advance for your support. I am very grateful for your donation and truly appreciate your kindness!)[/COLOR][COLOR skyblue] • The Papaw[/COLOR]

[CR][CR]Please consider supporting our efforts with a [B][COLOR deepskyblue]"cup of coffee"[/COLOR][/B] by scanning the QR code or visiting [COLOR deepskyblue]bit.ly/3Lb5nd5[/COLOR]. [COLOR limegreen] (Generosity like yours is rare to find these days. I thank you in advance for your support. I am very grateful for your donation and truly appreciate your kindness!)[/COLOR][COLOR skyblue] • The Papaw[/COLOR]

[CR][CR]Please consider supporting our efforts with a [B][COLOR deepskyblue]"cup of coffee"[/COLOR][/B] by scanning the QR code or visiting [COLOR deepskyblue]bit.ly/3Lb5nd5[/COLOR]. [COLOR limegreen] (Generosity like yours is rare to find these days. I thank you in advance for your support. I am very grateful for your donation and truly appreciate your kindness!)[/COLOR][COLOR skyblue] • The Papaw[/COLOR]

[CR][CR]Veuillez envisager de soutenir nos efforts avec une [B][COLOR deepskyblue]"tasse de café"[/COLOR][/B] en scannant le code QR ou en visitant [COLOR deepskyblue]bit.ly/3Lb5nd5[/COLOR ]. [COLOR limegreen] (Une générosité comme la vôtre est rare à trouver de nos jours. Je vous remercie d'avance pour votre soutien. Je suis très reconnaissante pour votre don et j'apprécie vraiment votre gentillesse !)[/COLOR][COLOR skyblue] • The Papaw[/COLOR]

[CR][CR]Пожалуйста, поддержите наши усилия [B][COLOR deepskyblue]"чашкой кофе"[/COLOR][/B], отсканировав QR-код или посетив [COLOR deepskyblue]bit.ly/3Lb5nd5[/COLOR ]. [ЦВЕТ лаймово] (Такую щедрость, как ваша, редко встретишь в наши дни. Заранее благодарю вас за поддержку. Я очень благодарен за ваше пожертвование и искренне ценю вашу доброту!) [/COLOR][ЦВЕТ небесно-голубой] • Папа[/COLOR]
